1.0.name: wordpress/category-checklist-expander
1.0.description: This plugin increases the height of the category checklist meta box on the post editing screen so that all categories are shown. No more scrolling! All of your categories will be visible. If you've been frustrated by having to scroll to find the correct category, this plugin is for you. No options. Just install it and you're good.
